DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the long-term efficacy and safety of latanoprost monotherapy in patients with normal tension glaucoma (NTG) using a prospective, observational design. Visits were scheduled at 6-month intervals for 24 months. Intraocular pressure (IOP), optic nerve head findings, visual field status, and adverse events were recorded.
DOC.brief_title: Observational Study of the Long-term Effect of Latanoprost in Normal Tension Glaucoma
